org.phantomapi.game

Class PhantomGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.game.PhantomGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game, GameObjectContainer, PlayerContainer

    public abstract class PhantomGame
extends Object
implements Game
    Represents a phantom game instance implementation

    cyberpwn

        Start the game up after it's been initialized
        Specified by:
        startGame in interface Game
        Parameters:
        lauchParameters - the start parameters can be used for multi game environments or startup options. These are not needed for every type of game, no need to use them

        Stop the game
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
